    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3126</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards -No 26: Times Magazine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten - Nr. 26: Zeit-Zeitschrift</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de Lecture - Non 26 : Magazine de 
Périodes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões Da Leitura - No. 26: Compartimento
Das Épocas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi Della Lettura - No 26: Scomparto Di 
Periodi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες ανάγνωσης - αριθ. 26: Χρονικό 
περιοδικό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas De la Lectura - No 26: 
Compartimiento De las Épocas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An internet based writing activity where the student learns about he people of the century from Time Magazine.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">information retrieval</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">famous people</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet gründete Schreiben Aktivität, in 
der der Kursteilnehmer erlernt, daß ungefähr er vom Jahrhundert von 
der Zeit-Zeitschrift bevölkert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un Internet a basé l'activité d'écriture où 
l'étudiant apprend qu'environ il peuplent du siècle du magazine de 
temps.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um Internet baseou a atividade da escrita onde o 
estudante aprende que aproximadamente povoa do século do 
compartimento do tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un Internet ha basato l'attività di scrittura 
dove l'allievo impara che circa popola del secolo dallo scomparto di 
tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα Διαδίκτυο βάσισε τη δραστηριότητα γραψίματος 
όπου ο σπουδαστής μαθαίνει για τον άνθρωποι του αιώνα από το 
χρονικό περιοδικό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un Internet basó la actividad de la escritura 
donde el estudiante aprende que él puebla alrededor del siglo del 
compartimiento del tiempo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Information Retrieval</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
